spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout roughly matches (living/dining left, kitchen top, utility top-right, toilet mid-right, bedroom bottom-right), but key spatial details diverge. The right-side service/duct area is greatly enlarged in the 3D compared to the narrow shaft shown on the plan (major boundary/proportion mismatch). Several doors/openings are missing or not expressed (main entry, toilet entry, balcony access), making circulation inaccurate. Window/opening positions are not reliably represented.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall massing is mostly coherent and thickness looks reasonably consistent, but door embedding is largely incorrect/absent. Adjacencies are partially preserved (kitchen adjacent to living, utility adjacent to kitchen, toilet near bedroom), yet the oversized/open right-side void changes the intended enclosure and exterior boundary. No major labeled room is entirely omitted, but an extra/expanded exterior/void space is introduced beyond the 2D plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Core furniture is present (sofa set, dining table, bed) and generally plausible in scale. However, placement does not tightly match the 2D arrangement (living seating layout/positioning differs), and built-in elements like the bedroom wardrobe shown on plan are not modeled.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric view is clear with decent lighting and readable room separation. Geometry is mostly clean with minimal artifacts. However, the render simplifies openings and details (doors/windows), reducing architectural clarity, and the large right-side opening/void harms perceived correctness.

detected_errors.description: Right-side duct/shaft area is disproportionately large in the 3D render compared to the narrow service/shaft indicated on the 2D plan.
Hallucinated/expanded exterior void on the right side (appears as a large open courtyard/shaft) not matching the small marked shaft in the plan.
Main entry door at the top-left shown in the 2D plan is not clearly modeled/visible in the 3D render.
Toilet door/opening shown on the 2D plan is missing or not clearly represented in the 3D render.
Balcony access/opening from living area is not correctly depicted (balcony boundary/doorway/threshold is unclear compared to the 2D plan).
Bedroom wardrobe/built-in storage shown along the bedroom wall in the 2D plan is missing in the 3D render.
Window placements/openings (notably living/bedroom exterior windows) are not consistently mapped to the 2D plan; some appear missing or relocated.
